website_summaries.verdict: Praised for its sturdiness, this long-lasting gazebo holds up well in all kinds of weather.
pros: holds up well to snow and wind
Resists rust and corrosion, very durable
Roof is vented to improve airflow
Assembly takes about a day with a couple of people
cons: Some buyers note quality issues with the paint finish

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Sunjoy
customer_reviews.text: The product is good but the screens came in ripped. I contacted Sunjoy and they were supposed to warranty the screens last summer. It is now almost a year and they are not returning my calls or emails. I finally purchased replacement netting but should not have had to. This is a scam on the part of Sunjoy!
customer_reviews.author: CMN50

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good looking gazebo and the only one that has stood ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good looking gazebo and the only one that has stood up to gale force winds, several times now! Has totally exceeded our expectations!
customer_reviews.author: w. hankins

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts...no easy solution
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother-in-law in May but just getting around to putting it up. We are missing two key parts out of the box, and trying to get those two missing parts is such a hassle from Sunjoy. I have had to register the product..okay not a problem. Then I had to send my receipt twice, then I had to give all my information twice, and then I was told they would email me the forms to fill out for a warranty replacement. I just need two parts that are missing. I should not have to go through all of this, next they will want me to ship it back at my cost. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Who is stealing the magnets? 2 ordered. Both with no magnets for Upper screen.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a Sunjoy 10 x 12 Chatham Steel Hardtop Gazebo from you and received it 2 weeks ago. Its missing the 16 magnets and the rings/hooks for the screens. We have called Sunjoy 10 times and have been put on hold for over 45 minutes each time only to be hung up on. We have left 8 voice messages over 2 weeks with our contact info with NO return phone call as promised. What the hell is going on with your company??? Please call us and get us the missing parts. Ed and Helene D'Orazio 1516-443-4759.
customer_reviews.author: Helene and Edward D'Orazio

customer_reviews.title: Does its job and i saved a ton of cash i was thinking of wooden pergola
customer_reviews.text: so far so good the only gripe is that there are no rain gutters and the metal roof makes a sound when its hot and cold at night occasional thud as expected when metal contracts or expands
customer_reviews.author: Dieselfumes

customer_reviews.title: Cheap light weight metal
customer_reviews.text: One support post came damaged,a few holes did not line up when putting together.Very poor cheap light weight metal.No privacy curtains included is another inconvenience
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: extrlemely happy ...so far!
customer_reviews.text: Only have had this up since May but this gazebo survived Snow-vember in Buffalo....we did have to remove some snow but even with the heavy wet snow accumulation on it....it held up fantastic! We have it on a second floor deck and it holds up perfect to the Lake Erie wind too....so far i give it 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Pay for Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I recommend hiring the Amazon people to assemble it. They sent me two guys and it was their first time assembling this type/brand. They quickly knocked it out under 4 hours. I love this gazebo; mine was installed in the fall so I highly recommend getting the wind blocking curtains from Asprey...fit like a charm. This gazebo doesn’t leak; however, a rain gutter defector would have been nice (but I can jimmy something together to solve that. I have an awesome Turkish hanging lamp from center ceiling hook. I tried one of those hanging heat lamps at first but it was crappy product. Next, I will get a propane heater for the winter.
customer_reviews.author: jsis333

customer_reviews.title: Love my new gazebo!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the new gazebo that we purchased from Amazon. It is sturdy and very attractive. It took approximately 10 hours to put together. I thought that I would be able to assemble it myself, but I did need help. The instructions are good, but as others mentioned, watching the video really made it easy. We anchored it to the deck as we have pretty high winds. It really makes a difference as far as getting out of the sun and having some shade. I purchased the curtains separately to help when the sun is setting and to provide privacy.
customer_reviews.author: Florene K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This gazebo is huge and sturdy. Took 2-3 men 9-10 hours to put together. I’ve read reviews where people paid someone to put it together in 4 hours. I’m not sure how that’s possible if it’s put together right. We put it on our raised deck. We plan to bolt it down even though i doubt the wind could move it. The screen netting is nice. There are two rods so we used the second to hang string lights. This gazebo is everything I imagined it would be. Provides great shade from the sun shelter from the rain. 😃
customer_reviews.author: LexiTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Strudy Gazebo!!!
customer_reviews.text: We put our gazebo up on Saturday but I am already in love with it!!! It's definitely my new Happy place! It took my husband, father in law and I 9hrs. to fully assemble this. The instructions were clear and all parts were fine. I love everything about this except the color or the mosquito netting because I am not a fan of brown but the quality of the gazebo and netting is amazing so far. Also, the netting has great details for zipping, pulluing netting to the side, securing it to the gazebo, etc. Love, love, love!!!!! Will update as time goes on but so far it gets a solid 10 from me!!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice but low paint quality
customer_reviews.text: In general the gazebo is nice. The directions could be better as with most projects of this size. Hardware was good. I’m very handy and it took me and my wife a better part of a weekend to put together. Suggest watching YouTube video as it is better than the directions. My main disappointment was the paint job. 50% of our pieces had pretty major painting flaws. I have a picture that shows the type of paint flaws that were on the poles and posts. Not worth returning over but one day I will try and find matching paint and touch up.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Concerned about posts supporting weight
customer_reviews.text: The posts do not seem to be sturdy enough to support the full weight of the roof. As a safety precaution, I had to put 4x4 wood posts inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: The seller made the sale!!!
customer_reviews.text: I want to say I had a few issues with it... but not from mrpearl11 it was from sunjoy the manufacture only!! They didnt live up to, what has put the burden on mrpearl11 the seller to fix. The seller however went above and beyond to fix it and knowing they stand behind there sales like this.. I would buy from them again in a heartbeat!! Just type in mrpearl11 to view there products for many items associated with this product and more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy.  Everything fits nicely
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this quality. Shipped in 4 days. Sturdy cardboard and entire gazebo is enclosed in a steel cage so no damage. Extra bolts etc, yea. Up in about 10 hours with 2 males and one female reading directions. Install the roof in pieces on the structure and not on the ground b/c you will need a crane to lift it. No problems so far and I do not expect any.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Hallgren

customer_reviews.title: Very durable product and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The product was installed in 6 hours mainly with 1 person and some additional help for the main post frame. Instructions are pretty straight forward if you've assembled things before. Since we live in the northeast, we needed a durable gazebo that would withstand the winter and this one looks good. One the pricier models but worth it from a durability standpoint and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I built the frame the first day, but needed a second set of hands to connect them so our son came the second day to help us finish it. The most important thing to understand about the instructions is that each piece goes in a specific place. The directions are not always very clear, but it wasn't too hard to figure out since you couldn't really put it together wrong. We are very happy with the results!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Stuppnig

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good seller- Poor manufacturer (Sunjoy)
customer_reviews.text: Product overall is very nice and seems sturdy. The biggest problem we have is that one of the panels arrived damaged. It already appears to be rusting. The instructions clearly say contact "Sunjoy" not the distributor for replacement parts. We registered our product and ordered the replacement part. I have a confrimation number. A week later no response. I have sent emails to company with no response. Very unhappy with Sunjoy not the seller we bought from. Bottom line- if the product doesn't haveany defects probaby a great product. Just hope you don't need to contact the manufacturer, because it seems pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: 10x12 Chatham Steel Hardtop Gazbo
customer_reviews.text: If fit on my patio and it looks so good! I love it!! 10x12 Chatham Steel Hardtop.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Looks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Took me about 11 hrs- by myself to assemble. The fact it comes in its own skeleton metal frame- so as not to damage by shipping company- was a big bonus, as the handling destroyed the box. The parts are marked very well and I installed a power box while I had the roof frame assembly on the ground. the frame actually comes with a hook in the center for a lamp to hang- so worked out great. Purchased at same time the privacy curtain kit- since it has two rails inside for curtains- everything worked out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to patio
customer_reviews.text: This definitely took a solid day for two people to assemble, but I knew that when I ordered it. It came together nicely and seems very stable. I like that it has the mosquito netting option. It provides a nice shade on our patio and also kindof just brings things together. We can put our sand turtle, chairs, and even an inflatable pool under it. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thomas-Blate

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived by freight. Had to take piece by piece from driveway to back yard because the driveway is as far as they would go. Poured footings before assembly. In high winds and tornado warnings there have been no problems because the leg supports are secured into concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Query

customer_reviews.title: We love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking, heavy and well made product. It arrived in one box with no parts missing or damaged. It was very well packaged. We hired two young men to assemble for us and it took them a good 6 hours to do it - but they did not seem to have any undue issues putting it together. We've only had it for about a month now but I'm anticipating many happy seasons under this gazebo. And it doesn't leak!!!
customer_reviews.author: Likes Quality

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to give a review from someone who has owned and used the product for 5 years. My husband and I easily assembled it. Neighbors assisted in mounting it on our deck as it is very heavy. It is very sturdy and has stood up to heavy wet snow, high winds and hail. Overall we are very happy with our purchase. My only complaint is that the finish is starting to come off of the top and it is not very aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on the difficulty of assembly. I assembled it myself in a day and a half. It wasn't overly complicated. I would argue the order of assembly (putting roof box and extension poles together and then attaching to uprights vs. attaching extension poles to uprights and then attaching roof box). Minor scratches and dents on arrival - but then who cares - it's going outside in the elements anyway. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Don Risser

customer_reviews.title: Great gazebo simple assembly
customer_reviews.text: The gazebo is made well, I just installed a little over 3 weeks so I can’t rate it on durability as of yet. It has held up to strong winds over a cemented area.I am hoping that once the winter season gets here it will hold up on the north eastern snow.Installation was simple just time consuming. Will need min 3 people when attaching the gazebo together but other than that 2 people can assemble this in 4-6 hrs. One person reading and another actually doing the assembly. It does come with mosquito netting but not privacy curtain. Overall I am very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Franco

customer_reviews.title: We are 95% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are just OK the three of us often scratched our heads, but it is possible to complete trust me! You need to start with the very top and work your way down. I put 95% satisfied because of the mediocre instructions and one part of the design I think will let water in but for us that’s OK.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Morales

customer_reviews.title: Not a job for a weekend handyman to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I used a professional to install. It is beautiful. ...transforms my pool area into an island paradise. I do have a few scratches...not too noticeable..do you have a spray touch up??? Wish I knew how to send a photo!!! Maggie
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Be Patient ! ! !
customer_reviews.text: The Gazebo came with damaged boxes and scratches ( gouges ) on the 6X6 pole. The Gazebo looks nice fully assembled. Glad it came with the Mesquito nets. So glad that we read a couple of the Reviews because it was a lot easier to just assemble the structure and then add the roof panels after.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful sturdy gazeebo!
customer_reviews.text: We are so happy with our new gazeebo! It came on time in great condition. Packaging was 5 star as well. Assembly instruction were pretty good. We built ours around a hot tub so there were some challenges with that. Had to get the topper in place before setting the main roof. Other than that assembly went according to the directions. You will need 4-6 helpers and a full day to put it together. This product is well worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Brady

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy . I hired some contractors to assemble mines paid them $500.00 took them two days .. Overall it serve my family and I what we're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: This product was unbelievably well packed, the cardboard box was damaged when I received it so I was skeptical but when I opened it I found all the parts were inside a metal framing that totally protected it. It wasnt that difficult to put together, although the instructions were poor and only 2 pages long. It took about 12 hours and I did most of it by myself. I did put a bag of pea gravel down each leg for added weight.
customer_reviews.author: wayne heckman

customer_reviews.title: Great gazebo, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped with out damage, each piece is individually wrapped. PLan on three people to stabilize and assemble the base.then had my son do the roof frame.that was day one. Next two days about 4or 5 hours each I finished the roof. The directions aren't hard to follow but you have to plan ahead because they discribe how parts go together but not how they are oriented. I'm 72 and got it done.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - but watch video for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as promised, and absolutely no damage in shipping. Parts (there are many) were very clearly labeled and none were missing or damaged. My husband had put it about one-quarter together and I found a video on assembly for him to watch. He said he wished he had seen it first. Video was good and differed in the order in which to assemble different parts. LOVE the finished product - it looks stately, elegant, and permanent. Looking forward to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: Carey in Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: Love the touch of GOLD!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit overwhelmed when looking for gazebos...wood v. aluminum. Decided on this product because we don't want to be bothered with the upkeep of wood. After reading several reviews the only thing I was worried about was the instructions or lack thereof, as many people said. This was NOT a problem at all. Took three guys less than three hours to put together! As others have stated, do not build the roof separately and try to lift it on. Too heavy! Very well packaged!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Milkovits

customer_reviews.title: five stars for sturdiness and appearance
customer_reviews.text: the directions are garbage and the hardware seems random. ended up with a bit of extra bolts. the product itself is very sturdy and looks nice. Spend the extra money for the sturdier gazebo that hopefully will last.
customer_reviews.author: steele rage

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Directions weren’t easy to follow and a few perhaps steps not in ideal order. Biggest issue is it came scratched from shipping but also other areas of paint chipped away during assembly. Seller gave a small refund for scratches and sending us replacement pieces. Otherwise nice and big.
customer_reviews.author: Mt hood Impact

customer_reviews.title: lay out parts
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy lay out all parts before assembly follow pictures took 2 people 5 hours to assemble a drill with a 10mm socket makes it go faster
customer_reviews.author: engineer

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery! Neighbors envy!
customer_reviews.text: We love this. It took my husband 3 nights to put up, after work. Every piece was light enough for a 10 yr old to move. Looks great/
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: We read through the reviews and found them very helpful! It does take more than two people to assemble the top, tip to put panels on after assembled was helpful, plan for several hours. Impressed with construction and sturdiness. We have not had the opportunity to use and will be curious how the mosquito netting works and there are some gaps that they may get in. Looking forward to using it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: excellent gazebo so far
customer_reviews.text: excellent gazebo so far...made well,came right on time, packed great,all pieces in pkg.....emailed the shipper(mr pearl 11) for a few questions....great customer service...instructions are sketchy....just unpack all pieces and place them out before installing....it can be managed just fine....will need help lifting up......4-5 guys....waiting to see about high winds ?i anchored it to my deck.....
customer_reviews.author: Dean B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gazebo!
customer_reviews.text: This gazebo is great! Has already withstood high winds and thunderstorms without any leaks or movement. We did bolt down to cement patio though because Texas winds can be rough! Only issue were directions unclear. I did hire someone to put together. Delivery was easy as well and came in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Haynie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and dry inside
customer_reviews.text: Looks great took about 7 hours to assemble quality seams to be good. Arrived in one piece well packed so far very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Takes longer to assemble than we thought per the instruction guide
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product for an outdoor patio to cover our outdoor dining table. It was a little more time consuming to put together than was suggested, however not more difficult. We are satisfied and hope it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: speech teacher

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and heavy duty. It definitely takes more than one person to put this together
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Not too tough!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second backyard gazebo and the assembly was very smooth. I had read other people’s nightmare accounts of assembly and was a bit worried. I assembled it with a bit of manual assistance from my wife and daughter and lot of moral support from them. I followed the instructions and had very little problems.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie Dean

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: We love this gazebo. Strong. All metal. We had it put together .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! Put it up at our campsite. Get addition ,
customer_reviews.author: M. Long

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful gazebo well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gazebo well constructed. Two of us put it up in six hours, a little intimidating at the beginning but very good instructions. Netting is awesome, start putting it up on the 12ft side
customer_reviews.author: DONALD S.

customer_reviews.title: Everything Came In Correctly
customer_reviews.text: This Is for my back yard patio and it's PERFECT!! I love everything about it, looks just like I saw when I bought it and more.
customer_reviews.author: Angella

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, sturdy! Love this on our pool patio, simply beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Cinyd

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and sturdy gazebo!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of this brand (different house) and I love it! I've wired both for speakers and lights and its never let me down. I like that its black because if there's a blemish, a quick spray of satin black spray paint and you're all set!
customer_reviews.author: Denis Tyrell

customer_reviews.title: Love our gazebo
customer_reviews.text: The directions are a little hard to follow but a friend and I put it together in about 6 hours. Really impressed with design and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O'Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Finished my backyard Oasis!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this gazebo! The directions were not hard to follow as long as you went step by step. Very durable and I constantly get compliments!
customer_reviews.author: asheesh

customer_reviews.title: Went together easily.. 2 man job and finished in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaged excellently! Went together easily..2 man job and finished in a day. Only had it for 2 weeks or so, but I love sitting under it at night, enjoying the fireflies(but not the mosquitoes) We get a lot of wind during the winter here, so it will be interesting how well it fares.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo Newkirk

customer_reviews.title: Fantabulas
customer_reviews.text: It looks amazing....had it up in about 6hrs. Shades and protects my new deck and our family really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Medel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We got it up with 2 people with no problem! Love it and is anchored to my deck and covers my hot tub!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Wear gloves.  The metal gets hot and the roof pieces can be sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Did it by myself over a couple of days. Goes better if you have a second person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Gazebo - Does need more than one person to assemble. Be advised that it requires a min. of 4 very strong men to lift it up to put the base on it. Please with the quality of material
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my wife assembled the roof which was time consuming for sure!! By the time we needed the posts to be set-up, I had 5 people help out which worked out (but it was still kinda challenging!) I love how heavy and solid it feels, I don't feel the need to hook it up on my concrete.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gazebo recommended
customer_reviews.text: Directions and Refrigeration with item on paper need more detail great product
customer_reviews.author: mic JI

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but I got it install by a professional
customer_reviews.author: frederic m douay

customer_reviews.title: Good product, well made
customer_reviews.text: We are pleased with the canopy. My wife and I assembled it in one and a half days. I would definitely use the U-tube assembly guide from Sunjoy and not the written instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, let you know how winter in Ohio goes.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Reed

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought for our 25th anniversary and our son and daughter put it up in about 5-6hrs. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You definitely need at least 6 people to put this together if you are going to do-it-yourself
customer_reviews.text: We just put this up yesterday and have not put the netting up yet but so far we love it! All the pieces fit together just as the instructions said, we are very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Diederich

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Used amazon home services for the install, two workers were here 7 hours. The netting could be a little better, otherwise no complaints. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: mark dromgoole

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: What a great addition to our deck! Four of us worked together, followed the directions and had it together in four hours!
customer_reviews.author: sherry newton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor seating area
customer_reviews.text: We placed the gazebo on our concrete patio behind our home. It provides much needed shade from the hot sun. Good sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Crooks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The company was very cooperative and amazing at calling us personally with answers to the questions that we had. Great product totally in love with it. Look forward to using it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a very expensive jig saw puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Arrives in two large boxes the instructions are sub standard and very hard to follow. Seems like there are a hundred are more parts to assemble. Plan on spending hours if not days in putting it together. to be fair the product is high quality and parts are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk76

customer_reviews.title: Backyard oasis
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Happy we purchased this for our yard. Really makes a statement.
customer_reviews.author: crystal garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: finally assembled and I love it issues with the shipping company had me a little nervous--but it was well packaged, no damage
customer_reviews.author: MLS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is very nice, couldn't be more happier with the product and instillation
customer_reviews.author: tonyio

customer_reviews.title: When laying out the roof proof read the directions
customer_reviews.text: The assembly wasn’t as easy as they say it isn’t really hard just very tedious
customer_reviews.author: Alexboxing78

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, should be able to withstand the wind
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, very sturdy, should be able to withstand the wind. I recommend having professionals assemble it.
customer_reviews.author: dtutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this gazebo! Very well built and no complaints with it what so ever!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy so far
customer_reviews.text: Very happy so far. One month using. The netting is too long and it gets soaking wet when rains. I am not sure how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: Comes very ruggedly packaged with a welded steel "exo-skeleton" over cardboard to protect the sheets; mounted to "spliced" pallets. Although the instructions could have been edited much better, they are adequate. All the parts are all labeled with little stickers. I found a small battery powered impact drill (like those used for drywall) very useful for assembly. Assembly took me and my two home-from-college daughters about 8 hours spread over two days. There were some very minor paint defects, easily fixed with a small can of spray paint and tape. Other than that, the overall quality and durability is very high. Wish there was a place to order replacement screens.
customer_reviews.author: Silicon Valley Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Came in perfect condition, they said I couldn't build it alone ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition, they said I couldn't build it alone but two days later I had it up and completed. All the parts were there and things fit perfectly. It looks great, doesn't leak and is solid. Great addition to the patio. Mike, California
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Great service.  defective product.  Great service to solve problem.
customer_reviews.text: The finish was not powder coated. You could see the primer through the black coating. Amazon was wonderful about it. SunJoy was not. MrPearl 11 the manufacturer was great and we were compensated for the cost. I would do business with Amazon any time!
customer_reviews.author: melody eide

customer_reviews.title: but we elected not to build the roof 1st but rather to do it afterward and boy were we glad we elected to do it that way
customer_reviews.text: I just received my gazebo the other day and my friend and me installed it in around 7 hours, but we elected not to build the roof 1st but rather to do it afterward and boy were we glad we elected to do it that way. I do not understand how the majority of people selected to try and build the roof on the ground and then have to get 5-6 to lift this thing when you can just do panel by panel at your own leisure. Actually i don't even know how time is saved building the roof on the ground. Anyway so far so good as it did rain last night. Will keep you updated!!
customer_reviews.author: keith M.

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty hand so it was not problematic
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is impeccable. This can be built between two people but you must not follow the instructions. I put up the posts then built the top. I'm pretty handy so it was not problematic. It took me 10 hours to build it. Granted I took breaks to play with the dogs. I had help for about half hour while I installed the small top portion. It holds up great. Wind rain and sun have been no problem. The netting is nice and there is a second rod for curtains or privacy panel. I'm going to hang a projector screen on one side. All in all great product. I will update with photos soon.
customer_reviews.author: JAC

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice gazebo! Its really heavy and I had it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice gazebo! Its really heavy and I had it bolted to my patio pavers. It did come a tad beat up in shipping. There are slight dents on two areas on one side but they aren't that noticeable. The hardware package was ripped open in shipping but ALL pieces were there. I hired two handymen to put it together and it took about 6 1/2 hours. But it looks beautiful! I would give it 5 stars but because of the shipping issues I took off a star!
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, we assembled it pretty quickly with three people. Use horses to hold up to put the beams on.
customer_reviews.author: Darby Bishop

customer_reviews.title: a good choice
customer_reviews.text: I had it set up by a contractor who was working on my deck and I am very satisfied with it. It has withstood winds of 30 mph with no trouble. +
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POOR assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: The assembly instructions were VERY POOR at best. After a few re-dos we got it together. We also find that the dark color seems to amplify the suns' heat.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rosentrater

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Packed very well but extremely difficult and time consuming to assemble
customer_reviews.author: John DeMotte

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was fantastic and all parts were there
customer_reviews.text: my husband and I assembled this together.It did take us 4 days but he just had shoulder surgery(rotary cuff) and can use only one hand ..We assembled top on ground and I stood on a stool holding top up so he could put legs on.After putting legs on we assembled roof panels.We are both in our 70's and did not find this hard to do.The packaging was fantastic and all parts were there.Thought instructions were clear.Love the finished look.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hoegenauer

customer_reviews.title: 10 x 12 Chatham steel hard top gazebo
customer_reviews.text: It took my son & I 8 hours to to assemble the gazebo. You will need a few additional hands to lift & assemble the legs to the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: sunjoy 10 x 12 Chatham Steel Hardtop Gazebo
product_meta.description: Color:ChathamEnjoy summer days and endless fall nights relaxing beneath the shade of this beautifully designed Chatham gazebo. It combines the durability of a powder coated steel construction with a hard top that keeps rain out while letting fresh air in through a vented top. This stylish look is sure to add an element of tranquility to your outdoor seating area. Create your own private oasis with comfortable chaise lounge chairs and plush cushions, or host elegant outdoor dinner parties beneath its expansive canopy. You can even set it over a hot tub for your own luxurious retreat right in your own backyard. Specifications: Secure with bolts or stakes for more secure positioning Peak height is 120," with a clearance height of 79" Shipping Weight: 550 lbs The gazebo will usually ship within two business days of payment. Once shipped, allow 3-9 additional business days for freight delivery, the freight carrier provides a complimentary lift-gate service with delivery to your curb. We will provide tracking and a telephone number for your convenience. You must be present at the time of delivery. Package updated - Item comes in one box strapped to the pallet.
feature_bullets: 10 x 12 ft hardtop metal steel roof is long lasting and durable
Aluminum and powder coated steel rust resistant frame
Vented roof for optimum airflow and comfort
Can be bolted down; Package updated - Item comes in one box strapped to the pallet. Professional assembly required.
